para.text: As you can see from the plug-in framework
, it is possible to embed several Dolphin applets into the same web page. Each applet will be executed in the same plug-in

so it is possible for them to collaborate with each other. One applet can locate another by means of its textual name. You'll recall that one of the optional attributes available within the EMBED tag is NAME and this can be used to associate each applet with its own unique name. Then it is only necessary for one of the applets to make use of the
